mapper.select: SELECT t1.*, t2.name AS modelName, t3.name AS supplierName, t4.name AS locationName, t5.name AS depreciationName, u.nick_name AS assignedToName FROM itam_device t1 LEFT JOIN itam_models t2 ON t1.model_id = t2.id LEFT JOIN itam_suppliers t3 ON t1.supplier_id = t3.id LEFT JOIN itam_locations t4 ON t1.location_id = t4.id LEFT JOIN itam_depreciations t5 ON t1.depreciation_id = t5.id LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON t1.assigned_to = u.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
